ai-thag2.39:1.1_0: Arranging a robe over my shoulder,
ai-thag2.39:1.2_0: the color of young mango sprouts,
ai-thag2.39:1.3_0: I entered the village for alms
ai-thag2.39:2.1_0: But when I dismounted from the elephant,
ai-thag2.39:2.3_0: I burned with shame, but then I found peace,
ai-thag2.39:2.4_0: that I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
